components-cards-backgroundcard--backgro.title: Security concept
components-cards-backgroundcard--backgro.text: Yandex Cloud is a public cloud platform that provides corporations, medium businesses, and individual developers with a scalable infrastructure, data storage services, and ML and development tools.
components-cards-backgroundcard--backgro.additionalInfo: Yandex Cloud was launched in 2018 and has doubled in size since then. Both in total revenue and in terms of its customer base: more than 10 thousand companies now use our services every day.
